Description:
PN you have failed to provide a suitable and sufficient scaffold to protect the risk of persons falling internally  from the scaffold to the front of the 1st lift, suitable top, mid rails were missing

IN You have failed to ensure those workers under your control have suitable and sufficient welfare provided at site to comply with Schedule 2 of the above named Regulations. Namely a toilet and welfare cabin that both have a supply of hot and cold running water, and are in a clean and tidy state.
